name: jQuery.isFunction
title: jQuery.isFunction()
desc: Determine if the argument passed is a Javascript function object.

argument.desc: Object to test whether or not it is a function.
argument.name: obj

examples.css:
div { color:blue; margin:2px; font-size:14px; }
  span { color:red; }

examples.desc: Finds out if the parameter is a function.

entries.longdesc: Note: As of jQuery 1.3, functions provided by the browser like alert() and DOM element methods like getAttribute() are not guaranteed to be detected as functions in browsers such as Internet Explorer.
